english.segment1: It doesnt matter who I was. It doesnt matter where Ive been. Your grace is all I am chasing. It doesnt matter when I wake. It doesnt matter when I sleep. Your arms are open for me
english.segment3: I am complete cause you say I could .. I am may clean into the round will stay. You are Jesus (repeats). You are everything I need. You are holy I am dirty. In You I am clean. You are Jesus
english.segment4: You get my brain and its moving backward. You hear my voice when I am screaming. You feel my pain so long ago. Your . just fallow me
